title: Summoner name change not aviable after transfering to EU-WEST from EUNE
body: I transfered from EUNE to WEST, and i got no option to change my Summoner Name (you are suposed to get a summoner name change thingy), but i got no option to do that, and now my name is just random letters and numbers. Anyone else experienced this?

replies.body: Hey, sorry about that!  I dug into this for you and got you flagged for a name change on your next login.
Thank you so much! Appreciate it ^^
